query_1.text: Who was Napoleon Bonaparte and what were his significant contributions to European history?

query_2.text: What major battles did Napoleon Bonaparte lead during his military career?

query_3.text: When did Napoleon Bonaparte rise to power in France and when did he ultimately fall from grace?

query_4.text: Where did Napoleon Bonaparte spend his final years after his exile?

query_5.text: Why did Napoleon Bonaparte's ambitions lead to widespread conflict across Europe?

query_6.text: How did Napoleon Bonaparte's legal reforms, particularly the Napoleonic Code, impact the legal systems in Europe?
